ch0286_00_svboy/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I was hoping
you’d come!
ch0286_00_svboy/0101_0701_02_10: Let’s go on another treasure hunt today!
ch0286_00_svboy/7101_0701_01_10:
The entrance hall at my school in Paldea has walls
that are stacked with books!
ch0286_00_svboy/7101_0701_02_10:
Books are treasure troves of knowledge. I’d like to
try reading all the books in the school someday.
ch0286_00_svboy/7102_0701_01_10:
I guess you could say the Pokémon Centers in
Paldea are open air.
ch0286_00_svboy/7102_0701_02_10:
I wonder if they’re set up that way so people can
drop by even while riding a Pokémon.
ch0286_00_svboy/7103_0701_01_10: I’m so excited Pasio has so many strong Trainers!
ch0286_00_svboy/7103_0701_02_10:
I have the most fun when I’m brainstorming what
strategies to use in battle!
ch0286_00_svboy/7104_0701_01_10: I think learning makes your world bigger.
ch0286_00_svboy/7104_0701_02_10:
I want to learn more and more to keep expanding
my world!
ch0286_00_svboy/7105_0701_01_10:
What sort of things interest you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0286_00_svboy/7105_0701_02_10:
I’ve got so many things I want to know that I can’t
narrow it down to just one.
ch0286_00_svboy/1701_0701_01_10: There’s something I wanted to give you.
ch0286_00_svboy/1701_0702_01_10: I hope that helps with your studies!
ch0286_00_svboy/2501_0701_01_10:
Sandwiches aren’t all about flavor. How they look
is important, too.
ch0286_00_svboy/2501_0701_02_10:
I mean, even if a sandwich tasted amazing,
you wouldn’t feel like eating it if it looked like
a mess, right?
ch0286_00_svboy/2501_0701_03_10:
That’s why I’m just as picky about how my food
looks as I am about how it tastes!
ch0286_00_svboy/2501_0702_01_10:
I’ve been changing up my picnic things to match
my sandwich fillings so I can enjoy sandwiches
even more!
ch0286_00_svboy/2501_0702_02_10:
My thought was atmosphere is important, too—
not just flavor and appearance!
ch0286_00_svboy/2501_0702_03_10:
Once I like something, I’m not satisfied until
I figure out all there is to know about it.
ch0286_00_svboy/2511_0701_01_10:
We study a lot of different things at school in
Paldea.
ch0286_00_svboy/2511_0701_02_10:
Biology, math, history, languages, battling...
And a lot of other things, too!
ch0286_00_svboy/2511_0701_03_10: I had fun learning in each class! It was awesome!
ch0286_00_svboy/2511_0702_01_10: Which class was my favorite? Let me see...
ch0286_00_svboy/2511_0702_02_10:
Maybe biology? After all, Mr. Jacq was my
homeroom teacher!
ch0286_00_svboy/3001_0701_01_10:
Eating a good breakfast helps my mind work
better the rest of the day!
ch0286_00_svboy/3003_0701_01_10:
The trick to making a good sandwich is striking the
right balance of ingredients.
ch0286_00_svboy/3005_0701_01_10:
This is a good time to observe the ecology of
nocturnal Pokémon!
